verses.verse: And <S%G1161><s%> it came to <S%G1096>pass,<s%> that, while <S%G625>Apollos<s%> <S%G1511>was<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2882>Corinth,<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> having passed <S%G1330>through<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G510>upper<s%> <S%G3313>coasts<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2181>Ephesus:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2147>finding<s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G3101>disciples,<s%>

He <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G1487>Have<s%> ye <S%G2983>received<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> since ye <S%G4100>believed?<s%> <S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G3588>they<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> We have not so much <S%G235>as<s%> <S%G3761><s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G1487>whether<s%> there <S%G2076>be<s%> any <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost.<s%>

And <S%G5037><s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G1519>Unto<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> were ye <S%G907>baptized?<s%> <S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G3588>they<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G1519>Unto<s%> <S%G2491>John's<s%> <S%G908>baptism.<s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G3303>verily<s%> <S%G907>baptized<s%> with the <S%G908>baptism<s%> of <S%G3341>repentance,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> unto <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2992>people,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they should <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> him which should <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> that <S%G5123>is,<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>
When <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G191>heard<s%> this, they were <S%G907>baptized<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3972>Paul<s%> had <S%G2007>laid<s%> his <S%G5495>hands<s%> upon <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>them;<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> they <S%G2980>spake<s%> with <S%G1100>tongues,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4395>prophesied.<s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G435>men<s%> <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G5616>about<s%> <S%G1177>twelve.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G1525>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4864>synagogue,<s%> and spake <S%G3955>boldly<s%> for the space <S%G1909>of<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G3376>months,<s%> <S%G1256>disputing<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3982>persuading<s%> the <S%G3588>things<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> <S%G5100>divers<s%> were <S%G4645>hardened,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> believed <S%G544>not,<s%> but spake <S%G2551>evil<s%> of that <S%G3598>way<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4128>multitude,<s%> he <S%G868>departed<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> and <S%G873>separated<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G1256>disputing<s%> <S%G2596>daily<s%> <S%G2250><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4981>school<s%> of <S%G5100>one<s%> <S%G5181>Tyrannus.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G1096>continued<s%> by the space <S%G1909>of<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2094>years;<s%> so <S%G5620>that<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> they which <S%G2730>dwelt<s%> in <S%G773>Asia<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1672>Greeks.<s%>
And <S%G5037><s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G4160>wrought<s%> <S%G3756>special<s%> <S%G5177><s%> <S%G1411>miracles<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%> of Paul: <S%G3972><s%>

So <S%G5620>that<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5559>body<s%> were <S%G2018>brought<s%> <S%G1909>unto<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G770>sick<s%> <S%G4676>handkerchiefs<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4612>aprons,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3554>diseases<s%> <S%G525>departed<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G4151>spirits<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> out <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4022>vagabond<s%> <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> <S%G1845>exorcists,<s%> took <S%G2021>upon<s%> them to <S%G3687>call<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> them which <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G4151>spirits<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> We <S%G3726>adjure<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> by <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G2784>preacheth.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> there <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G5207>sons<s%> of one <S%G4630>Sceva,<s%> a <S%G2453>Jew,<s%> and chief of the <S%G749>priests,<s%> which <S%G4160>did<s%> <S%G5124>so.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> I <S%G1097>know,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> I <S%G1987>know;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G2075>are<s%> <S%G5210>ye?<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G2177>leaped<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2634>overcame<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> and <S%G2480>prevailed<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> so <S%G5620>that<s%> they <S%G1628>fled<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%> <S%G1131>naked<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5135>wounded.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G1110>known<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1672>Greeks<s%> <S%G5037>also<s%> <S%G2730>dwelling<s%> at <S%G2181>Ephesus;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5401>fear<s%> <S%G1968>fell<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3956>all,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was <S%G3170>magnified.<s%>
And <S%G5037><s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> that <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G2064>came,<s%> and <S%G1843>confessed,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G312>showed<s%> <S%G848>their<s%> <S%G4234>deeds.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G2425>Many<s%> of them also which <S%G4238>used<s%> curious <S%G4021>arts<s%> brought their books <S%G4851>together,<s%> <S%G976><s%> and <S%G2618>burned<s%> them <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> men: <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G4860>counted<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5092>price<s%> of <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2147>found<s%> it fifty <S%G4002>thousand<s%> <S%G3461><s%> pieces of <S%G694>silver.<s%>
So <S%G3779><s%> <S%G2596>mightily<s%> <S%G2904><s%> <S%G837>grew<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2962>God<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2480>prevailed.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G5613>After<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> were <S%G4137>ended,<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G5087>purposed<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> when he had passed <S%G1330>through<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G882>Achaia,<s%> to <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G2036>saying,<s%> After <S%G3165>I<s%> have <S%G1096>been<s%> <S%G1563>there,<s%> <S%G3165>I<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G4516>Rome.<s%>

So <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> of them that <S%G1247>ministered<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G5095>Timothy<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2037>Erastus;<s%> but <S%G846>he<s%> himself <S%G1907>stayed<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G773>Asia<s%> for a <S%G5550>season.<s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G2596>same<s%> <S%G1565><s%> <S%G2540>time<s%> there <S%G1096>arose<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3641>small<s%> <S%G5017>stir<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> that <S%G3598>way.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> man <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G1216>Demetrius,<s%> a <S%G695>silversmith,<s%> which <S%G4160>made<s%> <S%G693>silver<s%> <S%G3485>shrines<s%> for <S%G735>Diana,<s%> <S%G3930>brought<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3641>small<s%> <S%G2039>gain<s%> unto <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5079>craftsmen;<s%>

Whom <S%G3739><s%> he called <S%G4867>together<s%> <S%G2532>with<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2040>workmen<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> like <S%G5108>occupation,<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G435>Sirs,<s%> ye <S%G1987>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G2039>craft<s%> we <S%G2076>have<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2142>wealth.<s%>

Moreover <S%G2532><s%> ye <S%G2334>see<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G191>hear,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3440>alone<s%> at <S%G2181>Ephesus,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G4975>almost<s%> throughout <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G773>Asia,<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> hath <S%G3982>persuaded<s%> and turned <S%G3179>away<s%> <S%G2425>much<s%> <S%G3793>people,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> they <S%G1526>be<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G2316>gods,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> are <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G1223>with<s%> hands: <S%G5495><s%>

So <S%G1161>that<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G2254>our<s%> <S%G3313>craft<s%> is in <S%G2793>danger<s%> to be set at <S%G2064>naught;<s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G557><s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> that <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2411>temple<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2299>goddess<s%> <S%G735>Diana<s%> should be <S%G1519>despised,<s%> <S%G3762><s%> <S%G3049><s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G848>her<s%> <S%G3168>magnificence<s%> <S%G3195>should<s%> <S%G2532>be<s%> <S%G2507>destroyed,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G773>Asia<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3625>world<s%> <S%G4576>worshippeth.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when they <S%G191>heard<s%> these sayings, they <S%G1096>were<s%> <S%G4134>full<s%> of <S%G2372>wrath,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> cried <S%G2896>out,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3173>Great<s%> is <S%G735>Diana<s%> of the <S%G2180>Ephesians.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> was <S%G4130>filled<s%> with <S%G4799>confusion:<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> having <S%G4884>caught<s%> <S%G1050>Gaius<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G708>Aristarchus,<s%> men of <S%G3110>Macedonia,<s%> <S%G3972>Paul's<s%> companions in <S%G4898>travel,<s%> they <S%G3729>rushed<s%> with one <S%G3661>accord<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2302>theater.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G1014>would<s%> have entered <S%G1525>in<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1218>people,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G1439>suffered<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3756>not.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G2532>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> chief of <S%G775>Asia,<s%> which <S%G5607>were<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5384>friends,<s%> <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3870>desiring<s%> him that he would <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1325>adventure<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2302>theater.<s%>

Some therefore cried one <S%G243>thing,<s%> <S%G3303><s%> <S%G3767><s%> <S%G2896><s%> and <S%G243>some<s%> <S%G5100>another:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1577>assembly<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G4797>confused;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> more <S%G4119>part<s%> <S%G1492>knew<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5101>wherefore<s%> <S%G1752><s%> they were come <S%G4905>together.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G4264>drew<s%> <S%G223>Alexander<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3793>multitude,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2453>Jews<s%> putting him <S%G4261>forward.<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G223>Alexander<s%> <S%G2678>beckoned<s%> with <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5495>hand,<s%> and <S%G2309>would<s%> have made his <S%G626>defense<s%> unto <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1218>people.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> when they <S%G1921>knew<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he <S%G2076>was<s%> a <S%G2453>Jew,<s%> all with one <S%G1096>voice<s%> <S%G5456><s%> <S%G3391><s%> <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3956><s%> about the space <S%G5613>of<s%> <S%G1909><s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G5610>hours<s%> cried <S%G2896>out,<s%> <S%G3173>Great<s%> is <S%G735>Diana<s%> of the <S%G2180>Ephesians.<s%>
